text.tspan: Improved sanitation facilities vs. GDP per capita, 2015
The share of the total population with access to improved sanitation facilities versus gross domestic product (GDP)
per capita, measured in 2011 international-$. Improved sanitation facilities are likely to ensure hygienic separation
of human excreta from human contact. They include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine),
ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet.
Improved sanitation facilities (% of population with access)
